definition: driving school/abbr. for 駕駛學校|驾驶学校
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)

sentences.english: I want to enroll in a driving school. Do you have any advice?
sentences.chinese: 我想報駕校。你能給我點兒建議嗎？

sentences.english: Does ten li River neighbouring driving check the regards which family teaches namely cheaply?
sentences.chinese: 十里河附近的駕校哪家即便宜又教的好？

sentences.english: look, I've typed “driver schools”, and there are so many results coming out.
sentences.chinese: 看啊，我輸入了“駕校”，然後出來了這麼多結果。

sentences.english: So I went to enroll in training school for drivers.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我就去了一家駕校報了名。

sentences.english: I want to go to a driving school, any advice?
sentences.chinese: 我想報駕校。能給我點建議嗎？

sentences.english: We've become very good friends after a month of learning in the driving school.
sentences.chinese: 在駕校共同學習一個月後，我們都成了好朋友。

sentences.english: Driving was to wait for verification to the lobby to wait for admission ticket issued.
sentences.chinese: 到駕校後來到待考大廳等候發准考證。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I practice driving in Longquan Driving School.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我去龍泉駕校練車。

definition: to ask for directions/to ask the way (to some place)
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to try one's luck/to leave sth to chance
